DEVTOOLS
=============

GDB
==
```
 (gdb) print b
 $4 = {1, 2, 3}

   that works.

 (gdb) print a
 $5 = (int *) 0x7fffffffe0f0

   that works too, but in order to print a as an array you must do:

 (gdb) print (int []) *a
 $7 = {1}

   and when you specify the size it gets better:

 (gdb) print (int [3]) *a
 $8 = {1, 2, 3}
```
